name: From Time to Love
description:
Well, all we are coming alone in this world, and passing also.

In this short prototype you can enjoy little platformer adventure of lyric hero, who's trying to find his love, but being hurt by fakes, but happy end is about him :D

Featuring pretty drawn pixel graphics, calm soundtrack and beautiful landscape -- go in this adventure, leaving your thoughts behind.

@DeCreador -- Graphics

weirdGuy -- Code/Music
